mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inter_wta_order_shipping_header (create_time, end_dt, wh_no, owner_no, task_no, c_task_type, car_no, op_status, driver, order_no, send_flag, error_message, send_time) SELECT #{createTime}, #{endDt}, #{whNo}, #{ownerNo}, #{taskNo}, #{cTaskType}, #{carNo}, #{opStatus}, #{driver}, #{orderNo}, #{sendFlag}, #{errorMessage}, #{sendTime} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM inter_wta_order_shipping_header WHERE task_no = #{taskNo} );

INSERT INTO inter_wta_order_shipping_goods (order_no, task_type, task_no, g_code, d_ack_qty, op_status, source_no) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{taskType}, #{taskNo}, #{gCode}, #{dAckQty}, #{opStatus}, #{sourceNo});

INSERT INTO inter_wta_return_order_back_header (create_time, back_no, company_id, note, owner_no, po_no, rec_no, wh_no) SELECT #{createTime}, #{backNo}, #{companyId}, #{note}, #{ownerNo}, #{poNo}, #{recNo}, #{whNo} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM inter_wta_return_order_back_header WHERE po_no = #{poNo} );
INSERT INTO inter_wta_return_order_back_goods (gcode, rec_id, rec_no, rec_qty) VALUES (#{gcode}, #{recId}, #{recNo}, #{recQty});

INSERT INTO inter_wta_warehouse_whole_split_to_unit (warehouse_no, owner_no, direct_no, sku, d_sku, qty, d_qty, status, creator_no, create_time, company_id) SELECT #{warehouseNo}, #{ownerNo}, #{directNo}, #{sku}, #{dSku}, #{qty}, #{dQty}, #{status}, #{creatorNo}, #{createTime}, #{companyId} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM inter_wta_warehouse_whole_split_to_unit WHERE direct_no = #{directNo} );

INSERT INTO inter_wta_warehouse_allocation_header (warehouse_no, owner_no, allocation_no, allocation_type, allocation_status, shipping_warehouse_no, po_no, po_type, note, modify_time, create_time, upload_status, company_id) SELECT #{warehouseNo}, #{ownerNo}, #{allocationNo}, #{allocationType}, #{allocationStatus}, #{shippingWarehouseNo}, #{poNo}, #{poType}, #{note}, #{modifyTime}, #{createTime}, #{uploadStatus}, #{companyId} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM inter_wta_warehouse_allocation_header WHERE allocation_no = #{allocationNo} );

INSERT INTO inter_wta_warehouse_allocation_goods (ack_qty, check_time, check_qty, sku, note, allocation_id, allocation_no) VALUES (#{ackQty}, #{checkTime}, #{checkQty}, #{sku}, #{note}, #{allocationId}, #{allocationNo});

INSERT INTO inter_wta_warehouse_purchase_header (warehouse_no, rec_no, gather_rec_no, gather_no, in_no, note, purchase_no, company_id) SELECT #{warehouseNo}, #{recNo}, #{gatherRecNo}, #{gatherNo}, #{inNo}, #{note}, #{purchaseNo}, #{companyId} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM inter_wta_warehouse_purchase_header WHERE purchase_no = #{purchaseNo} );
INSERT INTO inter_wta_warehouse_purchase_goods (rec_id, rec_no, rec_qty, sku) VALUES (#{recId}, #{recNo}, #{recQty}, #{sku});

INSERT INTO inter_wta_warehouse_report_damage_overflow (warehouse_no, owner_no, waste_no, waste_id, waste_type, sku, qty, waste_status, company_id) SELECT #{warehouseNo}, #{ownerNo}, #{wasteNo}, #{wasteId}, #{wasteType}, #{sku}, #{qty}, #{wasteStatus}, #{companyId} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM inter_wta_warehouse_report_damage_overflow WHERE waste_no = #{wasteNo} );
